snippet.title: Survivor Mercs - Core Gameplay Trailer (Pre-Early Access)
snippet.description:
Play the demo on Steam during #SteamNextFest between June 19 and June 26, 2023
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2141520?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=base&utm_medium=web

Join our official Discord server: https://discord.gg/RvPGefyAnY

This gameplay trailer shows all in-game footage or the core game of Survivor Mercs. Play the demo for yourself on Steam!
-----------------------------------------------------------
Survive. Loot. Extract. Repeat!
Master the individual quirks of over 1000 commanders. Lead your mercenary squad against a relentless army. Dominate the battlefield. Get the loot - or die trying! This roguelite bullet-heaven extraction shooter tests your wits and skill. Lock, load & loot, Commander!
-----------------------------------------------------------
Survivor Mercs blends auto-shooter bullet-heaven and extraction shooter into a high risk, high reward roguelite - with a squad, randomized heroes, procedural maps, and lots of loot.

If Vampire Survivors, Brotato, 20 Minutes Till Dawn, Rogue Legacy, and Zero Sievert had a bastard child - this is Survivor Mercs!
